data.text: Just had a 4 night stay at this lovely hotel. Everything was so clean. Friendly and helpful staff always with a smile. Fabulous location with views of Catedral spire from the pool area on the 4th floor, which is a lovely outside area to relax as well as lounge in the sun. We will definitely be returning.
data.title: Great hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're delighted to hear that you had a lovely 4-night stay at our hotel and that everything was clean and to your satisfaction. It's great to know that our staff was friendly, helpful, and always with a smile. We're glad you enjoyed the fabulous location and the views of the Cathedral spire from our pool area on the 4th floor. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!
owner_response.author: Adri√†  Garcia

data.text:
From my experience I believe this hotel has acted unscrupulously and I would be very wary of booking accommodation here through booking.com.
It was my daughters 30th Birthday so I booked three rooms in this hotel in November  2023 through booking.com for a break on 4th April 2024. The agreement was to pay the hotel on arrival and with the ability to cancel up until 1st  April. A week before we were due to arrive I had an email to say that they had tried to validate my credit card and it was declined. I checked the credit card details on booking.com which were correct and emailed the hotel asking them to contact me so that I could sort out the payment before I arrived. The next day my booking was cancelled due to an invalid card. My credit card company confirmed that my card was valid, had ample funds available and that the hotel had NOT tried to take any money. I phoned the hotel to sort out my booking but overnight (within 8 hours) my rooms had been booked so they had no availability. I went back onto booking.com urgently needing new accommodation only to find the rooms advertised back on the site at ¬£1554.00 MORE. So  they resold my rooms for more money leaving me and my family looking for alternative accommodation during the Easter Break- a very unprofessional way to deal with your customers I feel. Also, because I was to pay the hotel directly Booking.com said they were unable to help.
data.title: UNSCRUPULOUS BEHAVIOUR BEWARE

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
We hope this message finds you well. I want to extend our sincerest apologies for the frustration and inconvenience you've experienced as described in your message.
Upon review, it seems there was a problem with our system's attempt to validate your credit card. This is not a common issue.
Please understand, our intentions have always been to act in good faith, prioritizing the well-being and satisfaction of our guests above all.
Upon contacting us, our aim was to search for and provide several options to effectively address the inconvenience. However, we understand that, for personal reasons, these solutions were not convenient for you, leading you to book another hotel.
owner_response.author: Adri√†  Garcia

data.text: Fantastic location of this beautiful hotel. If I were to come back, I would book the same hotel.  Alex, the concierge, was instrumental in providing fantastic options for dinner. We were here for four nights and the two options that Alex provided were keepers and for sure we will be coming back. The food was amazing. Alex was incredibly helpful in every aspect of our trip and allowed us to enjoy this beautiful part of the country even more. Many thanks üôè
data.title: BRILLIANT BARCELONA!!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you loved our hotel's fantastic location and that you'd choose to stay with us again. It's wonderful to know that Alex, our concierge, provided excellent dinner options that made your stay memorable. We're delighted that you enjoyed the food and that him assistance enhanced your experience in our beautiful country. We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!
owner_response.author: Adri√†  Garcia

data.text:
You could get a better location! Just off from the cathedral and very central for everything else.
Our room was modern, clean, the bed super comfortable and the shower powerful (always a bonus!).
Being on the first floor it was a little noisy from the street but it didn‚Äôt keep us awake.
The staff were all friendly, especially Tino - an absolute asset to the hotel!
The breakfast was plentiful and offered a good choice, although the hot section was only warm. 
Being sin gluten - I was offered a Schar selection of crackers, cereal & cake but over our 4 night stay, they were unable to offer bread. A shame but there was still lots for me to eat and we found lots of gluten free options in local bakeries and restaurants . 
Check-out was easy and the hotel kept our luggage safe whilst we spent our final day in the city. We were sad to leave and would definitely return if we came back to Barcelona.
data.title: Great hotel in the best location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your detailed feedback! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the modern, clean room with a comfortable bed and powerful shower. We're glad that despite some street noise, it didn't disrupt your sleep. We appreciate your kind words about our friendly staff, especially Tino. We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the temperature of the hot breakfast items and the limited gluten-free bread options. However, we're glad you found other gluten-free options in local establishments. We're pleased that check-out was easy and that we could accommodate your luggage storage needs. We'd love to welcome you back if you return to Barcelona!
owner_response.author: Adri√†  Garcia

data.text: Very nice hotel - friendly and helpful staff, good facilities, convenient location and excellent breakfast. Except it‚Äôs quite noisy day and night, because it‚Äôs near the square where Barcelona Cathedral is located, a lot tourists flowing through the vicinity, you can even hear them talking at night. I was woken up every night by different sounds.
data.title: Beautiful Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We're glad you appreciated our friendly staff, good facilities, convenient location, and excellent breakfast. However, we apologize for the noise disturbances caused by the nearby square and tourist flow, which affected your sleep. We'll take your feedback into consideration to improve our guests' experience in the future.
owner_response.author: Adri√†  Garcia
